articles.content: Scientists in the United Kingdom have found evidence that humans infected with SARS-CoV-2, which causes coronavirus, can transmit it to cats. Researchers from the University of Glasgow when screening… [+2812 chars]

articles.author: Suryatapa Bhattacharya, Kejal Vyas, Drew Hinshaw
articles.title: Covid-19 Is Still Raging in Much of the World as Global Cases Hit Record Highs - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: New variants, pandemic fatigue and easing of lockdowns have virus surging in many countries
articles.content:
While hopes are rising that a rapid rollout of Covid-19 vaccines is helping to tame the pandemic in the U.S., in much of the world the virus is still surging.
